title: Seraphic Fire - Mozart: Requiem (NYC) 02/17/2016
desc: Seraphic Fire is pleased to offer an encore presentation of Mozart's signature opus, with a completion commissioned by Seraphic Fire featuring three newly-composed movements?by young American composer Gregory Spears.??A completion that offers more musical rewards? [it] drew on hundreds of years of music history, with echoes of Bach and Mozart, glowing Romantic harmonies, glints of contemporary dissonance, and the effective use of timpani? ( South Florida Classical Review ). Mozart: Requiem? is made possible through a generous gift by David L. Webb and W. Lynn McLaughlin. We kindly inform you that children under age 8 are not permitted at Seraphic Fire concerts.
